abstracts.cdata!:
This Second Petroleum Project is a
            follow-up on the first project of its kind in Liberia to
            promote petroleum exploration.  The project will assist the
            Government in promoting additional acreage for petroleum
            exploration which will include participation and funding by
            private companies.  In addition, the project will continue
            with the:  (i) institutional strengthening initiated under
            the first project and assist in the formulation of rational
            policies in the petroleum sector.  The project further
            consists of; (ii) offshore exploration promotion which
            includes acquisition of new seismic data and a review of
            existing information; (iii) onshore exploration which
            involves a gravity survey and geochemical analysis and;
            finally (iv) petroleum procurement and storage.
